jminusminus

? Scanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • jminusminus.Scanner

  • class Scanner
extends java.lang.Object
    A lexical analyzer for j--, that has no backtracking mechanism. When you add a new token to the scanner, you must also add an entry in the TokenKind enum in TokenInfo.java specifying the kind and image of the new token.
